editorialNotes.tagline: Tons of fun on one screen

editorialNotes.short: Costumes and special events are waiting for you.

editorialNotes.standard: We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.
This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property, and rake in profits.

Hipster Whale's Apple Design Award–winning game takes a timeless arcade formula—cross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstacles—and transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, you’ll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. There’s a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other games—like Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Road’s wacky world are unmistakable.
editorialNotes.short: These games are tough, but without a challenge, what's the point of ruling leaderboards?

editorialNotes.tagline: Start a new life in the country
editorialNotes.standard: Running a farm is hard and often thankless work—unless that farm happens to be an adorable piece of virtual land overseen by a helpful, chatty scarecrow. Swiping across plots of land to harvest crops, feed livestock and manufacture goods is pleasantly relaxing, and growing your tiny farm into a booming business is a hugely satisfying achievement. Silly characters, cute critters and a variety of things to plant, reap, build and sell make Hay Day easy to pick up and tough to put down.

editorialNotes.tagline: In your world, you are the hero

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The maze-running classic stays fresh with creative challenges and power-ups packed into story and adventure modes.
editorialNotes.short: Devour those delicious dots as fast as you can.

editorialNotes.standard: Hamster wheels for exercise? Fishing ponds filled with capybaras? There’s so much cuteness packed into this idle resort game—we may never leave!

name: Pet Doctor Care games for kids

editorialNotes.tagline: This cute dog needs your help

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: From the mind of gaming visionary Jenova Chen, Sky: Children of the Light is full of enchanting delights. Soar over rolling hills, through voluminous cloud formations, and across stunning vistas as you explore a remarkable fantasy world. Every puzzle unlocks unexpected paths; clever social features make flying together as easy as holding hands. So go on. Take a leap.

Ancient Egyptians loved cats, Metallica hasn’t played the Super Bowl, and the Ganges is India’s largest river—all our useless knowledge is now coming in handy thanks to Trivia Crack. This bite-sized trivia game is totally irresistible, whether we’re dominating our Facebook friends in classic mode, trouncing strangers in the 12-question challenge mode, or just sneaking in a game on our Apple Watch. With its cute characters, heaps of unlockable achievements, and a massive variety of questions, we simply can’t get enough.

editorialNotes.standard: The Wizarding World springs to life in Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells. Match your way through memorable moments—clearing puzzle boards of pesky trolls, chocolate frogs, and more—as you’re treated to gorgeous levels inspired by the beloved books and films. This best-in-class match-3’s most impressive bit of sorcery is conjuring up a distinct take on puzzle games—one that’s packed with spells, daily challenges, and collectible beasts. You’ll feel as powerful as Dumbledore himself.
